com.example.painintheass.GameLogic

Class AI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.painintheass.GameLogic.AI

  • public class AI
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles all Units and Projectiles creation, movement, animation, collision and destruction. This class is a collection of threads.

      • AI

        public AI(Team[] MyTeams,

        Creates an AI.
        Parameters:
        MyTeams - - The friendly and enemy teams.

    • Method Detail

      • makeSpawnDecision

        public int[] makeSpawnDecision()
        Skeleton of the future AI spawning decision making.
        Returns:
        Array of unit types

      • spawnUnits

        public void spawnUnits()
        Spawns random units. Will cease if spawningUnits and gameIsRunning are set to false.

      • updateUnits

        public void updateUnits()
        Handles move, attack and animation updates. Will cease if calcMoves and gameIsRunning are set to false.

      • checkCollision

        public void checkCollision()
        Handles collision detection of both units and projectiles. Will cease if calcCollisions and gameIsRunning are set to false.

      • deleteUnits

        public void deleteUnits()
        Deletes dead units. Will cease if gameIsRunning is set to false.

      • quit

        public void quit()
        Stops all the running threads.

      • pause

        public void pause()
        Calls stopMovingUnits().

      • stopMovingUnits

        public void stopMovingUnits()
        Pauses the update and collision threads.

      • startMovingUnits

        public void startMovingUnits()
        Resumes the update and collision threads.

      • isSpawningUnits

        public boolean isSpawningUnits()

      • setSpawningUnits

        public void setSpawningUnits(boolean spawningUnits)
